scripts.start:dev: rm -rf bin && npm run typescript:compile && npm run sass:compile && concurrent 'node bin/webpack/devserver' 'nodemon -i webpack-assets.json bin/server.js' 'npm run sass:watch'
scripts.compile: rm -rf bin && rm -rf public/styles && npm run sass:compile && npm run typescript:complile && webpack --config=bin/webpack/webpack.config.js
